_header: Of love and truth with long continuance
_description: Devotion to his mistress — seven stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
Off lufe and trewth with lang continwansall may ȝe luvaris cum
                    leir at me…
Banna.Last Lines:
…In to my mynd evir In remenbransoff lufe and trewth with lang
                    continwans
